channel.description: Recent content in 2021-03-27 05:40:27 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 27 Mar 2021 05:40
item.description:
@cctpolice What would it take for you to legalize or make it mandatory for all ambulances to drive on the opposite direction of traffic flow? I’ve seen this in Uganda and it’s amazing how swift they’re able to beat the traffic. Oncoming traffic had no option but to make way.

Link to Tweet
item.content:encoded:
